name: Bram Stoker's Dracula (PC)
description: The world's foremost horror story drives a stake through the heart of your PC with this long awaited sequel of the blockbuster movie. We invite you to enter one of the most amazing 3D worlds ever created and fight for your life as you play Harker, the only man in the living world who can stop Dracula in his plan to take yet another mortal soul.
